resources.string: © 2010—2011 Valera Leontyev. MobiOp widget. Version 0.3.3. Web: http://valera.ws/mobiop/ E-mail: feedbee@gmail.com

MobiOp is an Android Home Screen widget. It displays current Mobile Cellular Operator name and logo. All logos are embedded in program. Currently supported Russian, Belarusian and Ukrainian mobile networks: MTS, Velcom, Dialog, Life:), Megafon, Beeline, Utel, Tele2, Ukrtelecom, Kyivstar, Intertelecom, PEOPLEnet, CDMA UA, Golden Telecom, Kcell, Dalacomm, Kazakhtelecom, neo, Ucell, Perfectum Mobile. Pressing the widget initiates USSD "get current balance" request (*100#).
Mobile operator logo and name widget
